hints.content:
$\red{50}$ bricks is the same as $\red{5\text{ groups of ten}}$ bricks.

There are $\blue4$ walls.

Total number of bricks:  
$\begin{align}&\blue4\times\red{5\text{ groups of ten}}\\
=&\purple{20\text{ groups of ten}}\\
=&\purple{200}\end{align}$

question.content:
Part of the castle needs repairs. $4$ walls need to be rebuilt, and $50$ bricks are needed for each wall.

**How many bricks are needed in all?**
